song.title: Dileepa Podi Puthu
song.content:
[Intro/Inter] -------------------------------------------- |[D] |[G] |[D] |[G] | |[D] |[Em] |[A] |[D] |
[Chorus] -------------------------------------------- [D] [G] Dilee...pa podi... puthu sanee...payata nidi [D] [A] [A] |[Ab]| [G] Mawage ukul... yaha...ne... [G] [D] [Em] Kumaraya...neni mage kirula... himi [A] [A7] [D] Jeewana raja... dahane
[Verse 1] -------------------------------------------- [D] [G] Parevi depa... vani sulalitha ko...mala [D] [D7] Sumudu tikiri da...the [G] [D] [Em] Puthu mita mola...wan sangawagena atha [A] [A7] [D] Manoliyuwa geethe
[Verse 2] -------------------------------------------- [D] [G] Mahada wima...naye thanpath kala le... [D] [D7] Binduwak adu...wa athe... [G] [D] [Em] Eya sangawa...gena bilindu vesin a... [A] [A7] [D] Wasthuwa obaya puthe
[Ending] -------------------------------------------- [G] [D] hmmmmm [G] [D] hmmmmm [Em] [A] [D] haa aa aa
